name: Airplane flight simulator 3
description:
Airplane flight simulator 3 is new flight simulator which if full of challenge. It lets you to practice landing and taking off your 3D airplane. This challenging flight sim 3D game is that you have a limit amount of time to go to your destination and land airplane safely on the ground. The real 3D landing and take-off amazingly is what you need to learn with this wonderful 3D flight game. The Airplane flight simulator 3 is also a best for aircraft game for pilots that know fly an airplane to the airport.

It takes you to the skies and start flying at highest point in the newest flight simulation. This game can make your way up to the top. You could be the best airplane pilot in the gaming world. Airplane flight simulator 3 provides you unique flight missions and a huge selection of airplanes to choose from given list.

In this terrific game landing a huge airplane is much tricky. You should be sure to reduce the speed down to slow the plane to prepare for landing. If you careless then you might accidentally crash the plane many times. But by Using the piloting skills to land the airplane on the runway to stop the plane and let the passengers off to complete level.
